strapiEvent.name: Art on the Bricks: Digitally Yours
strapiEvent.description:
Discover the creative talent of local and visiting digital artists at this month’s Art on the Bricks exhibition, Digitally Yours: A Celebration of Digital Art, in Downtown Rogers on Thursday, Jul 13, from 4:30-7:30p.

  • Follow the red brick road: Art on the Bricks highlights Downtown Rogers’s nightlife, dining, shopping, and art opportunities every second Thursday of the month. During the summer, it coincides perfectly with Railyard Live’s Local Showcase at Butterfield Stage.
  • Let’s get digital: This month’s event highlights the creative world of digital art with demonstrations of plasma cutter artwork, animations, illustrations, and digitally-generated artwork with the power of AI during a live demo at The Rogers Experimental House.

Find more details for Art On the Bricks HERE.
